settings.hero_description: Your at-home blackhead remover and pore cleaner that helps cleanse pores, remove excess oil and impurities, and leaves skin looking fresher and smoother. Rechargeable, cordless, and compact enough for home or travel—take clearer-looking skin wherever you go.

settings.benefit_1: Deep pore cleansing support—helps remove blackheads, excess oil, and impurities
settings.benefit_2: Five interchangeable suction heads for different areas and skin needs
settings.benefit_3: Rechargeable and wireless—no cords to limit your movement
settings.benefit_4: Compact and travel-friendly (170 × 37 × 14 mm) for easy storage and on-the-go use
settings.benefit_5: Skin looks smoother, fresher, and more refined with regular use

settings.step_description: Charge your device using the built-in rechargeable battery. Follow the charging instructions in your user manual for best results.
Select the suction head that matches your skin area or concern. The device includes five different heads designed for various needs. Refer to the included guide for recommendations.

Gently glide the device over your skin to help remove impurities and cleanse pores. Always follow the user manual for proper technique and recommended usage. Start with gentle settings and adjust as needed.

settings.heading: How to use your blackhead remover

settings.feature_description: Enjoy the convenience of pore cleansing at home, on your schedule. No need to book appointments—help your skin look clearer and more refined whenever you want.
Get a more personalized experience with five interchangeable suction heads. Each head is designed for different skin areas or concerns, giving you flexibility for your unique skincare routine.
Say goodbye to tangled cords and dead batteries. The built-in rechargeable battery gives you wireless freedom to use the device anywhere in your home or while traveling.
At just 170 × 37 × 14 mm, this compact device fits easily in your cosmetic bag, suitcase, or bathroom drawer. Maintain your skincare routine at home or on the go.
A practical step up from basic manual pore strips or squeezing. The electric suction helps cleanse pores more gently and hygienically, making it easier to keep skin looking its best.

settings.heading: Why choose this pore cleaner
settings.subheading: See why people are choosing this at-home blackhead remover for clearer, fresher-looking skin.

settings.persona_description: You want to help keep your pores clean and your skin looking fresh. This device offers a convenient way to support your regular skincare routine at home.
You prefer at-home skincare solutions that fit your schedule. Five suction heads give you options, while the rechargeable design means no cord hassles.
On the move frequently? This compact, cordless device travels easily and helps you maintain your skincare routine wherever life takes you.
Tired of pore strips that don't work well or squeezing that can irritate skin? This electric suction device offers a more hygienic, gentle approach to pore cleansing.

settings.heading: Is this pore cleaner right for you?
settings.description: This electric blackhead remover is great for anyone who wants an at-home solution to help cleanse pores and keep skin looking smoother and more refined.

settings.question: How do I use this safely?
settings.answer: Always read and follow the user manual before first use. Start with the lowest suction setting and test on a small area first. Move the device gently over your skin—avoid holding it in one spot for too long. If you experience discomfort or irritation, stop use immediately. The device is designed for facial cleansing support, not medical treatment.

settings.question: How often should I use this?
settings.answer: Usage frequency depends on your skin type and individual needs. Most people find 1-3 times per week works well, but we recommend starting with once per week and adjusting based on how your skin responds. Always follow the guidance in your user manual and listen to your skin. Overuse can cause irritation.

settings.question: Is this suitable for all skin types?
settings.answer: This device is designed for facial cleansing, but individual skin varies. If you have sensitive, acne-prone, or reactive skin, we recommend consulting with a dermatologist before use. Always do a patch test on a small area first. Start with the gentlest setting and discontinue use if you experience any adverse reactions.

settings.question: How do I clean the suction heads?
settings.answer: After each use, remove the suction head and rinse it with clean water to remove impurities and debris. Let it air dry completely before reattaching. Regularly cleaning the heads helps maintain hygiene and device performance. Follow the detailed cleaning instructions in your user manual.

settings.question: How do I charge it and how long does it last?
settings.answer: The device features a built-in rechargeable battery. Simply connect it to the charging cable (included) and plug into a power source. Charging time and usage duration will vary based on the battery and how you use it. Refer to your user manual for specific charging guidelines and battery care tips.

settings.question: How long does shipping take?
settings.answer: Orders are typically processed within 1-2 business days. Standard shipping usually takes 5-7 business days, though delivery times may vary by location. You'll receive tracking information once your order ships so you can monitor its progress.

settings.question: What about shipping and returns?
settings.answer: Orders are typically processed within 1-2 business days, with standard shipping taking 5-7 business days depending on location. We offer a 30-day return policy—if you're not satisfied, you may return the item in its original condition within 30 days. Contact our customer service team for shipping updates or return assistance.
